title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document comprehensive requirements for the PetHealthPredictor system, including a wide range of potential pet health issues to be predicted (e.g., obesity, diabetes, allergies), data sources (smart collars, home sensors, veterinary records), and expected system outputs (recommendations, alerts, reports). Define APIs for integration with external services such as pet nutrition providers and veterinary databases if necessary. Additionally, establish guidelines for data privacy and security.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components for data ingestion, preprocessing, machine learning model training, prediction, and user interface.

title: Set up Development Environment
description: Set up the development environment, including version control, continuous integration/deployment pipelines, and development tools.

title: Implement Data Ingestion and Preprocessing
description: Develop components for ingesting data from smart collars and home sensors, and preprocessing the data for machine learning model training.

title: Develop Machine Learning Models
description: Research and develop machine learning models for predicting pet health issues based on the preprocessed data.

title: Build User Interface
description: Design and develop the user interface for displaying pet health predictions and related information.

title: Integrate System Components
description: Integrate the data ingestion, preprocessing, machine learning, and user interface components into a cohesive system.

title: Conduct Security Audit
description: Perform a security audit to identify and mitigate potential vulnerabilities in the system.

title: Test and Validate System
description: Develop and execute test cases to validate the system's functionality, performance, and accuracy.

title: Deploy and Monitor System
description: Deploy the PetHealthPredictor system to a production environment and set up monitoring and logging mechanisms.

title: Write Documentation
description: Document the system's architecture, components, and usage for developers and end-users.
